title: MiLB Scores Landing page - defaults to AAA
custom_steps:
WHEN user visits 
- https://www.milb.com/scores 
- https://www.milb.com/scoreboard
- milb.com/scores
custom_expected: THEN Scores page should default to AAA Scores

title: Page Titles for MiLB Scores (Class, League, Affiliation)
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. user loads MiLB Scores page
2. user loads MiLB League Scores page
3. user loads MiLB Class Scores page
4. user loads MiLB Org. Affiliates Scores page
custom_expected:
THEN
1. MiLB Scores
2. MiLB $league Scores
3. MiLB $class Scores	
4. MiLB $Organization Affiliate Scores

title: Page Description for MiLB Scores (MiLB, League, Class, Affiliates)
custom_steps:
WHEN
1. user loads MiLB, Class, Org. Affiliates Scores page
2. user loads MiLB League Scores page
custom_expected:
THEN the SEO page description should be 
1. "The official scoreboard of Minor League Baseball including Gameday, video, highlights and box score."
2. "The official scoreboard of the $league including Gameday, video, highlights and box score."

title: Slugs - Class Scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user visits MiLB Scores page for Class

title: Slugs - League Scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user visits League Scores page

title: Slugs - Class & League Scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user visits Class & League Scores page

title: Slugs - Organization Affiliate page
custom_steps: WHEN user visits Organization Affiliate Scores page

title: Slugs - Class & League & Org. Affiliate page
custom_steps: WHEN user visits Scores page with Class & League & Org. Affiliate page

title: Slugs - Class names
custom_steps: WHEN user visits a MiLB Class
custom_expected:
THEN slugs appear as:
- aaa
- aa
- a-advanced
- a
- short-season
- rookie

title: Game data - default Game times are displayed in ET
Scoreboard displays games for selected date
Scoreboard flips to next day at 10AM
Date picker - Dates can be selected
Current Day Game Notes - Displays notes about all games
Game data - Game times are displayed according to League/Team page (ET,PT,CT,MT)
Game cell - Game state is displayed (abstractGameState)
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Probables - Probable pitchers are displayed
custom_preconds:
Probable Pitchers
Team TriCode
Starting Pitcher
Handedness
Uniform Number
Record
ERA

title: Team Leader - Player Name (Wins or RBI)
Team Leader - Win or RBI Total
Team Leader - Player name should link to Player Page
Game data - All game states are displayed on the scoreboard
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Diamond diagram - Bases with runners are shaded
Current pitcher - Uniform number is displayed
Current pitcher - Innings pitched is displayed
Current pitcher - Total pitches is displayed
Current pitcher - Total pitches - Strikes - is displayed
Current batter - Uniform number is displayed
Current batter - Season batting average is displayed
Extra Innings - More recent nine innings displayed
Extra Innings - Scroll allows access to earlier/later innings
Game data - All game states are displayed on the scoreboard
Game data - If extra innings, show final inning
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Winning pitcher - Player name is displayed
Winning pitcher - Season record is displayed
Losing pitcher - Player name is displayed
Losing pitcher - Season record is displayed
Save - Season Save Total is displayed
Home runs - Player name is displayed
Home runs - Season home run total is displayed
Preview Link - Displayed for all games not live/final - XL, L, M, S, XS
Ticket Link - Displayed when ticket link is available - XL, L, M, S, XS
MLB.TV Link - Displayed when media .on - XL, L, M
MLB.TV Link - Displayed when media .archive - XL, L, M
Gameday Link - Displayed for connected/non-final games - XL, L, M, S, XS
Box Link - Displayed when connected/postgame games - XL, L, M, S, XS
Audio Link - Displayed when media .on - XL, L, M, S, XS
Audio Link - Displayed when media .archive - XL, L, M, S, XS
PPD - Original Game Date is "Final" - PPD: Makeup MM/DD
M - Displays 728x90 ad between every 3 games
XS - Displays 300x250 & 320x50 ads placed between every 3 games (rotated)
Default dropdown display for Class dropdown is Triple-A (AAA)
Class options (Triple-A, Double-A, Class A - Adv, Class A, Class A -SS, Rookie)
Selecting Affiliate dropdown filter will rest Class/League filters
Selecting a League will update the SB to display League's games
Selecting a Class will update the SB to display Class' games
Selecting a Affiliate will update the SB to display to show the Affiliate's games
LMB (Mexican League) will only show on SB if that League is selected
Scoreboard displays games for selected date
Scoreboard flips to next day at 10AM
Game data - Game times are displayed according to League/Team page (ET,PT,CT,MT)
Game data - default Game times are displayed in ET
Date picker - Dates can be selected
Current Day Game Notes - Displays notes about all games
Confirm No Product links for game cells
Game cell - Game state is displayed (abstractGameState)
Teams - Away team displayed on top
Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
Probables - Probable pitchers are displayed

PPD - Original Game Date is "Final" - PPD: Makeup MM/DD
PPD - Makeup Date is "Preview" - Makeup of MM/DD - PPD
CAN - Original Game Date is "Final" - Cancelled
SUSP - Original Game Date "Suspended" - T/U status - SUSP (T6): Resumed on MM/DD - Keep inning indicator and add note
SUSP - Original Game Date "Completed" - O/T status - SUSP; Completed on MM/DD
SUSP - Resumed Date - "Suspended" - T/U status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD - Add score, inning indicator and note
SUSP - Resume Date - "Completed" - O/T status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD
